source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_00<tab>Houu may prefer not to deal with finless ones, but he has wisdom enough to see the merits of employing one shorewalker to kill another.
target: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のホォウは、冒険者に教えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_01<tab>Serpent Reavers have been guiding the Coral Tridents to trading vessels, and Houu does not like what easy prey these ships have become. An ambush point has been staked out at the approach to the Sapsa Spawning Grounds, where these seamen are due to appear. Slay three drowned seamen.
target: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_01<tab>ホォウから、「珊瑚の銛」に入れ知恵する「海蛇の舌」の航海士を倒すよう頼まれた。サプサ産卵地の入口付近の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E933401 /var>」で待機し、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20AA801 /var>」と「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20AA901 /var>」を3体倒そう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_02<tab>You have dealt with the drowned seamen accordingly. Return to Houu in Novv's Nursery and inform him that the trading vessels should sail in more safety for the time being.
target: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_02<tab>「海蛇の舌」の航海士を倒した。ノォヴの育成地の「ホォウ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_03<tab>Houu receives the news of the Reavers' deaths with a gladness most lugubrious. You may be a shorewalker, but as long as you are available to dispatch the more belligerent members of your species, you will be welcome at Novv's Nursery.
target: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_SEQ_03<tab>ホォウに、「海蛇の舌」の航海士を退治したことを報告した。ヒレナシを嫌っているというホォウだが、航海士を倒したことで、無辜の人々の被害が減ることを願っているようだ。引き続き協力し、冒険者の力でホォウの願いを叶えよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_TODO_00<tab>Lie in wait for Serpent Reaver seamen at the approach to the Sapsa Spawning Grounds.
target: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_TODO_00<tab>サプサ産卵地入口の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E933401 /var>で待機し現れた海蛇の航海士を討伐

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_000<tab>It is a fact that the Shhherpent Reavers aid the Coral Tridents to attack trading shhhips... They guide the Tridents right to where the shhhips will be moshhht vulnerable.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_000フスィーッ……。
「珊瑚の銛」が……簡単にヒレナシの船を襲える理由……
それは、「海蛇の舌」の航海士が入れ知恵をしてるからだ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_001<tab>The Reavers and these prey may be shhhorewalkers both, but...it lies ill with me and my shhhpawnbrothers when the Tridents profit in any way. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_001ヒレナシのせいで……ヒレナシが困るのは自業自得……。
されど「珊瑚の銛」が幅を利かせてるのは……
我らも……フスィーッ……いささか困る……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_002<tab>These Reaver shhheamen who bespeak the Tridents...they are due to shhhojourn from the Shhherpent's Tongue to the Shhhapsa Shhhpawning Grounds. Shhhuitable for an ambush, I think...right at the approach to the grounds...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_002フスィーッ……「海蛇の舌」の航海士を倒してきてくれ……。
奴らが海蛇の巣穴から、サプサ産卵地に赴く機会を狙え……
入口付近で待機し、待ち伏せをするのだ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Lay an ambush at the approach to the Shhhapsa Shhhpawning Grounds... It shhherves us both to see those Reaver shhheamen shhhilenced.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_010フスィーッ……サプサ産卵地に行き、
「海蛇の舌」の航海士を倒してきてくれ……。
サプサ産卵地の入口付近で待機し、待ち伏せをするのだ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_020<tab>The Reavers shhhleep with the fishes? Good... They will guide no more Trident attacks. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_020フスィーッ……航海士の排除、済んだようだな……。
奴らが手引きしなければ、
「珊瑚の銛」も……船を襲撃しにくくなるはず……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_021<tab>Shhhodden or dry, I say shhhorewalkers are not to be trusted. I weep not for any shhhorewalker shhhips lost, but...the clutchfather shhhpeaks of keeping our eye on the prize...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_021フスィーッ……俺はヒレナシが嫌いだ……。
船が沈もうが一向に構いはしない……フスィーッ。
だが、目的を間違ってはならぬと……親父に言われている。

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_022<tab>War is the enemy, and these ties between the Tridents and shhhorewalker pirates lash the shhhea to greater tumult... Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_HOUU_000_022いたずらに戦火を広げる「海蛇の舌」がいなくなり……
フスィーッ……被害が少しは収まるだろう……。
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません

source: TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_BALLOON_000_031<tab>A landlubber, aye? Drag ye into the sea, we will!
TEXT_BANSAH203_01392_BALLOON_000_032<tab>I'll see ye to a watery grave!
